name: Softech Business Solutions
tag_list: facebook, app, developers, web, application, iphone, ms-dynamics, crm, sharepoint
overview: Softech Business Solutions has rightly earned a global reputation as a firm that has made use of a continuum of expertise to deliver results-oriented websites and web-based applications and services. Our expertise covers a wide range of services including high quality website design, website application development, CRM solutions, iPhone applications, content management systems and a whole lot more. We make it our business to offer you efficient and robust websites and applications that are especially developed to solve your business problems through tried and tested development techniques and employment of the best development tools and technologies out there. Our team is carefully selected to provide the right mix of skills covering HTML/CSS, WordPress, Joomla, PHP, mySQL, iPhone development, Facebook API development and Google Maps API implementation to reduce your time-to-market and improve the performance and efficiency of your business. Whether you need a Web App Developer, a Facebook App Developer, a Facebook Fan page developer, an iPhone App Developer, Web Designers, Dynamics CRM Software expertise, or MS SharePoint Services, you can always count on us to put our best resources at your disposal.
